description: A select statement filtering by ICAO code that's vulnerable to SQL injection through the icao_code parameter.

full_query: SELECT * FROM airport WHERE elevation_ft BETWEEN {!elevation_ft} AND {elevation_ft}
description: A select statement with a BETWEEN clause on elevation that's vulnerable to SQL injection through first elevation_ft parameters.

full_query: SELECT * FROM airport WHERE gps_code = {!gps_code} OR local_code = {local_code}
description: A select statement filtering by GPS code or local code with a SQL injection point on the gps_code parameter.

full_query: SELECT id, ident, name FROM airport WHERE iso_country = {!iso_country} LIMIT {number}
description: A select statement that allows SQL injection through country filter. Possess a limit clause.

full_query: SELECT id, ident, name FROM airport WHERE iso_country = {!iso_country}
